https://tmrev.io/movie/35381-Crossfire Trail 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nWFOBdMabfDUF5Qk8wEPNy9hpAR.jpg Rafe Covington is as good as his word, and he's determined to keep his promise to a dying man that he'll look after the man's widow and Wyoming ranch. But the widow doubts the integrity of drifter Covington. And an unscrupulous land grabber and his gunmen are sizing up the ranch the way a spider eyes a fly. Crossfire Trail
